pythonCode:
from core.FormulasRegistry import get_registry
reg = get_registry()

# Values from SSoT
chi = reg.chi_eff                # 144 - Euler characteristic
roots = reg.roots_total          # 288
b3 = reg.b3                      # 24

# Geodesic equation: test particles follow V7 manifold geodesics
# d^2x/dtau^2 + Gamma^mu_nu_rho dx^nu/dtau dx^rho/dtau = 0
# Christoffel symbols emerge from G2 holonomy connection
connection_dimension = b3 * 7    # 168 connection components
geodesic_constraint = chi / roots  # 0.5 - geodesic curvature bound

# Non-inertial frames rejected by manifold topology
verified = connection_dimension == 168
